subject: Rewrite Split Crown with actual musical variety
description:
The current Split Crown has removed Crystalline but still sounds repetitive because:
- Lead: all 4 riff variations on same string 5, same rhythm (straight 8ths)
- Rhythm: cookie-cutter accompaniment patterns, no real counterpoint
- Bass: same root for 56 bars
- No register changes, no rhythmic contrast between parts

Need: different registers per section, different subdivisions (mix 8ths/16ths/quarters/ties), string changes, dynamic contour, bass follows the harmonic progression not just one root, real call-and-response between guitars.
activeForm: Rewriting Split Crown with musical variety
